title: A Killer Among Us
description: Tim, a drug representative and real estate guru whom was leading an ordinary life never let on that he was also leading the life of a murderer, kidnapper, and rapest. It wasn't until the authorities descended upon Tim's 400-acre property to find one of his captors still alive barely. She was chained to the wall of a storage container that Tim had set up. Many of the events are based upon a true story that took place with a serial killer living among us for a period of many years.
author: J.R. Glenn
